content.detailedDescription: 12/2/10 around my 1st break @work in fullerton,ca, i noticed the sun shining above with some very thin dusting of cloud or vapor layers in the atmosphere. what caught my eye was a very bright light ray (beam) aiming directly from the sun through this atmospheric made prism causing 1 circle of intense rainbow color except the light beam continued through the point of origin & remained constant. the same white ray of light. basically, a light beam. note, the military transport helicopters were in action. coincidence? all afternoon? i left work at 145p, drove down brea blvd in search of a good gas station. i then noticed that the sun now had 2 of the same prism points on ea side. ex. east point & west point. i took several pics via my samsung epic phone. hopefully, it will upload. after i stopped for gas on harbor & the 91fwy, i noticed another militart carrier/copter flying near by. then asherriff copter as well. please note, that today, 12/2/10, had a lot of chem/contrails from jets in the sky. could be due to the atmospheric change in temp...I am typing on my phone, so i do apologize for any misspellings. also on one of the pics or both, there was awhite dot or orb showing near the sun with a red glow around it. i used 4x zoom with 5mp  camera phone. maybe its a reflection bounce back on the camera lens. but it was huge and took up a portion of the southern sw sky.Also around 730p. near the 91 fwy western sky, a blue flash of light occured. 3rdly, 2 wks ago my son, 19, witnessed a bright white light flash upon the side of his face on a mon night, 11/22/10 11pm pst, n long beach,ca. it lit up the ky. on 11/23/10 he ran into an aquaintance whom had asked him if dhe was outside around 11pm the night before & asked him if he had noticed a bright light in the sky. coincidence?? this young man also stated that he was on market /long beachblvd @11pm. 11/22/10 w/ friends(this was apprx 1-2 miles from our home) & that some people had stared into the light & got sick. trash can lids lifted in the air & when the light had gone the lids fell back down. a friend of mine too that stays near hollywood,ca heard rumors about the light in the sky, originating near mojave desert.
content.summary: Rainbow/prismatic event occurance from the sun

content.detailedDescription: Noticed rectangular light in sky as i was driving on washington beltway toward ardmoor rd. saw this light 3 different times in 3 different places.  thought at first it was an airplane.  afterthought a ufo, but laughed it off in my mind.  i drove down ardmoor/ardwick road heading east(which was a secluded country road at that time).  when i reached the end to turn right (head south) onto lottsford/vista road i looked up and saw a rectagular craft hovering over the tree tops, which was to my left (driver's side of car). hovering over the treetops at the enterprise golf course.  it was the size of a football field.  lights were rotating around the rectagular craft and there was a blinking light on top and one of the bottom blinking simultaeously.  i had my 5 year son with me at the time and asked him if he was seeing the same thing as i.  to this day he remembers it.  i heard no engine sounds as my car window was open because i reached my head out to get a better look.  my son said he saw figures looking out of a window, i did not see them.  as i began to move forward the craft began to move with me and it was at that time i began to panic and drive faster.  the road led under a tunnel of trees and when i reached that point the craft swiftly and quietly disappeared in a matter of seconds over the trees.  at the time my boyfriend subscribed to the nicap newsletter.  when he received the september issue it has an article in it that stated 2 other people spotted the same craft and i did that same night in p.G. county.  i would like to know if you still have that article?  additionally, the next day i called andrews afb and asked about the project blue book that i wanted to report seeing a strange craft and they said they no longer accepted ufo calls and that the project blue book was closed.  i asked if they had such an aircraft that could hover and they said yes they did, however they did not describe the same as the one i saw.
content.summary: Rectagular, rotating lights all around, blinking light on top & bottom, steel girder like legs.

content.detailedDescription: I just saw the oddest thing, but it gets weirder. i was out back, i had just gotten home from work went outside to smoke when i saw this very very bright white light off in the distance, i thought maybe it was a plane coming right towards me to give it the bright light effect or maybe a helicopter but after watching it for 10 minutes it wasn't getting any closer. i opened the door to yell into my parents to come look at this. by the time i turned back around it was gone, nowhere to be seen. my mother then goes on to tell me what about 2 hours ago she was in the driveway and saw a bright white light. she went into the house to go to the porch area to get a better look at it and by the time she got out back the light was gone. she had not discussed this with me before i saw the light i saw. very odd.
content.summary: Very bright white light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down stanley blv. and as i aproached a stop light i saw an unusual set of lights coming toward me. it is common to see helocopters here but this did not fit that image. so i kept looking as it approached slowly. when the light turned green i pulled out and pulled over to get out and get a better look.I got out and just watched as it slowley moved by. i knew when i could see it what it was as this is the sixth time i have seen one. i thought it to be a tr-3. i do sky watches every night with my night vision goggles and i do record them. i have not yet got one on film as they usually move accross the sky very quickly. i was on my way to a boy scout meeting when i saw it. it had three white lights that were pretty big on the under side. it also had blinking white lights under it. there were white lights around the outside of the craft as well as a red light in the front. white blinking lights that were placed where the strait side of the craft started to roll around to the other striat side. one on each side. this craft was flying east at about 10 mph. if it were any type of airplane it would have fallen from the sky. i saw it at 7:36 pm and watched it for 3 or 4 minutes. i could not hear any sound but i did have freeway niose which may have made it hard to hear had it been present.I have been trying to get one of them on film but it just has not happened yet. i have some videos on *(info moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) if you choose to view them.
content.summary: Triangle flying low and slow

content.detailedDescription: on saturday evening, october 23rd, 2010 i, *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg), was heading west in a vehicle on center st. just east of 69th st. when i noticed a multi-colored object approximately a half of a mile south of  center st. at an altitude of approximately 500 feet. the object was heading east/southeastly towards offutt air force base in bellevue, ne which is a suburb of omaha, ne. the object was only multi-colored until i noticed the underside of the object had three(3) bright white lights in a triangular formation with a center red blinking or strobing light. that's when i recognized the object as a typical "flying triangle." then i noticed the "front leading white light" dimmed out. i wasn't able to continue to observe the object, because i had to keep my eyes on the road. the object didn't appear to be like anything i had seen before due to the array of colored lights. i liken it to a christmas tree on its side or a christmas reef "floating through the air." it did not make a sound. i made sure i did not have a problem hearing it, because i turned off the radio and rolled down the window in the vehicle. it appeared to be just "gliding" along. the object didn't produce any sound that i could detect even though it was just approximately a half mile away at approximately 500 feet in altitude. i have seen multi-colored flying objects before hand and since then, but that was the only occasion that i was able to identify the object as a known/classified u.A.P. due to the fact of the "flying triangle" signature.
content.summary: Saw multi-colored object  w/3  white lights in triangle & 1 red ctr. light blinking

content.detailedDescription: I was getting off the 134 east at figueroa in eagle rock, ca. i was startled by the bright light in the sky with a prism of light going through it. i was called by a friend to ask if i was in the area and what direction to look. he stated that he had been looking at it for approximately an hour and couldn't figure out what it was. when i first saw it i thought it was the sun and then gasped out loud when i realized the sun was to the left of the object. it was quite a bit smaller than the sun, but at first glance i thought it was the sun because it was that bright.
content.summary: It was a bright light south east of the sun. it looked like a smaller version of the sun with a prism of light going through it.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving into waupaca on cth e traveling southbound from the ogdensburg area when i noticed a bright light in the sky to south and a little west. the sky was clear with only bright stars visible to the south and more visible to the north.  i pulled over to the shoulder and as i was watching the light, another formed next to it, only lasting for a few seconds.  both lights disappeared for approx 5 seconds, reappeared for approx 10 seconds and again disappeared.I did not see them return. the light was a bright orange/yellow color, steady and not moving.  i,as well as others in the area, have see similar lights to the south in the past, with as many as a dozen lined up in formation just above the horizon.
content.summary: Bright lights in southern sky

content.detailedDescription:
I am a firefighter and we had moved down to station one (above address) to cover their district as they were on a call. while there i was on the phone with a friend, walking around outside the rear apron of the station. i looked up and saw a giant black triangle, relatively low altitude 10,000'(?)about the level that low altitude planes are flying, it flew directly over my head, as it was over head the shape of the triangle changed, i say "changed" well what i know is that the patters of lights on the bottom of this ship changed so maybe it was a angle issue of something i don't know, what i do know is first is was just a triangle then a second later is was a triangle with an extension in the front. it made no noise, none at all, the lights were all identical in shape size and color, the blackness of the craft blocked out the stars behind it (it was solid). the lights were subdued red/orange and constantly light besides the front (shape change), they were rectangle in shape and outlined the entire ship, it was a black triangle with red/orange brick shaped lights around its outer edge, nothing past the lights as i could see the stars again. ok, the shape change - what happened was the triangle all of a sudden had extended its front point, what i mean by this is, first the lights and blacked out sky were triangular and the next second the front of the ship had extended with lights, now the lights extended from the front (top) of the triangle and the lights were arranged in a parallel line up of maybe two or three lights out from the front, then back out at an angle for one brick and another at an angle back in, and another brick forward then the two parallel bricks came together angled in towards each other. i was shocked both when i first saw this and i told my friend on the phone holy **** there is a ufo flying over my head, she continued to talk and i said did you hear me, i am looking at a ufo flying over, she said take a picture, i knew there was no time to take a picture and i don't think the phone camera would have caught anything anyway, besides i couldn't take my eyes of it. i feel it was at a low altitude one for the size of the ship and as it went out of sight relatively quickly, it was ~ 6' wide at its back and flew about the same speed as aircraft.

 i immediatly thought it was a "black triangle" i don't feel it was "out of this world" i feel it is our military's.  i am always looking up into the sky at night looking at the stars, and just happened to be outside at the time.
content.summary: Silent black triangle flew directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were headed to havasu city at app. 2:15 pm to meet some friends. we left bullhead city on hwy 95 to needles, ca. and turned east on hwy 40. we exited hwy 40 going south toward havasu. about 4-5 miles i saw what i thought to be a small military plane appear in the west and it proceeded east.The exact point we were at gave us at least a 150 degree view of the sky.This is desert open land.There were mountains to the south another 4-5 miles but they did not obstruct the view of the sky where the object was traveling. the object passed over us and cleared our entire field of view in only seconds. i immediately rolled down the window on my side to experience the sound however, the sound was minimal. my wife heard nothing.I commented to my wife that it was highly unusual for a plane of any kind to be in this area.The only landing fields are for very small private planes, nothing like what we had just seen. there are no air bases close. the usual flight pattern for commercial aircraft crosses over kingman- bullhead city but not this far south(app. 60 mi) i was in the us air force for 5 years. i am very familiar with planes. after some consideration and thought i now, do not  believe we saw a normal/conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Small winged aircraft--small military-- slight eradic/jerking  movement

content.detailedDescription: I live on the outskirts of town. my home backs up to several acres of nothing but woods. no homes near the object sighting. i was getting up from bed to let my dog out the back to go to the bathroom when i reached for the patio door to open it. as soon as i looked otside i saw a huge ball of flame shoot upward from the ground about 10 ft. behind the trees which are about 400 ft. from my house. i had a very clear shot. it rose straight upward then made a complete turn toward the top of my house and it completely vanished. it was completely silent. by the time i hurried to the front of the house, it was gone. i know it definately was not a shooting star because it rose from the ground straight upward.
content.summary: Saw huge flame shooting from ground

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were sitting on our couch in the living room of our home. we were looking out the bay window overlooking lower harbor on lake superior. we both noticed this very large and bright almost foglight looking craft going at a 45 degree angle towards the power plant. it was moving unbelievably fast towards the ground. we both thought it was going to crash. then as it got really close to the ground, it slowed down to almost nothing and leveled out. it seemed to slow down like it hit a pillow. it slowed to almost a stop and slowly cruised along the shore line. it was very very low to the ground. it had a huge bright spotlight on the front that was being shined all over the shoreline as it passed over.  it looked like a flying wedge of cheese. it was a flat looking black, almost gunmetal. had a smooth look to it. i could see no seems or edges to it. it had a row of lights along the outsides of it running towards the back. it was moving so slowly and completely quiet. if it was any thing normal, it would have fallen right out of the sky.  my home from the shoreline where it flew over is about 3 blocks or so.  we could see it very well and that it was extremely large. while moving with the shoreline, it passed behind the larger of the two smoke stacks on the powerplant at southbeach. it was lower than the taller stack, but above the shorter one. i have been told that the taller stack is approx. 3oo feet tall. that thing was about 280 feet up or so.  as soon as it passed the second smoke stack, it turned towards the ski hill or airport at ki sawyer airforce base. it was still moving very very slowly. the thing that got me about when it turned, was that it turned perfectly 90 degrees with out banking or slowing leaning or anything.  it went paralell to hampton street, which is only two over from mine. it was very low, it was flying up hill. once it got to the peak of the hill side, it flashed off at ungodly speed towards the airport. it made no noise when it went from maybe a mile or two an hour to infinity in a blink of the eye. i have saw what i feel is a flying triangle the size of a football field in length go right by. we were in such awe, that we couldn't look away in fear of missing something. anyone else see this with us? would love to hear from someone!

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Saw a huge triangle flying over the harbor shining spotlight down along shore while passing two powerplants.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my home cleaning. the suddenly a copter flew over head very low and loud and fast over my home. i didnt think much of it because it happens often. but this copter was going back and forward over my home it was getting on my nerves. so i grab my digital camera  and went out and took three pictures  of the copter watched it for a while as it was flying around in circles one street away from my street very low. that was all i saw was the copter. four to five days went by and i load my camera on to my computer and there it was.  my computer automatic blows the pictures up to 300 times when loading. the orb look like it was giving off heat or somthing because it was blurred around it. i started showing everyone i ran into, and some skeptic but after they kept coming back to look at it they said weird. some say its a bird, no way it is a good picture. it is right below the copter, i got a good picture. once it is blown up it does blurr to really see it but it is still very clear it is a orb. i kept showing friends and different people and one friend stated to me that the copter is are local news copter. it is channel 13 eyewitness news, its blurred but i do see it now.Many stated to me they do believe now and they didnt before. i would love to show someone in the ufo division my photo on my computer. i would also state that this isnt the first time i spotted a orb and copter. when i was walking my dog in the area one weekend about 4-5 years ago i spotted a copter and orb again. i didnt have a camera so i didnt tell anyone and i always believed in all this stuff and i watch ufo programs when they are on tv all the time when its on. and the last thing my friends want to here is about ufo and such so i learn to keep quite. its a good picture and i plan to join a ufo group now and show my picture to them. i always wanted to get more into the ufo and such but never really had the guts until now because i have somthing to bring to the table and it has got me going.I dont know how to send pictures over the computer but you will probably here it or see it threw the grapevine because i am going to get more involved.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb very small metallici

content.detailedDescription: i live in a rural area in south central mississippi. my husband was gone on a job one weekend and i was in my house watching tv with my three stepchildren and my nephew. i noticed a light coming through the  window blinds that face my backyard. i originally believed someone had pulled around to the back of my home and was in the process of driving away. i went to the window, but didn't see a vehicle. i then walked to the front door, where surrounded by children i still failed to see a car. then, i looked up and slowly cruising above a juvenile pine tree-line was the most astonishing sight i have ever beheld. the object was metallic silver and square shaped, edges were rounded, the top was slightly domed. there were lights shining down from the four corners. the bottom was smooth and seemless. there seemed to be no means of propulsion. this object was approximately 10 feet above the trees yet there was no movement from the pine trees. my stepdaughter asked me, ( is that what i think it is?) i replied, ( i don't know what that is  sweety but we're locking the door.) the children slept in my room that night and every night that they came to visit for about a month until the event began to fade for them. we still talk about it every now and then..But we don't go outside after the sun starts setting anymore.
content.summary: Metallic, square shaped ufo slowly cruising over treeline traveling approximately 5 mph  in a westward direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was setting up my teliscopes and looking up at the stares to the north when 2 ships that i have never seen before came over my home.
thay didnt look very high up.1 higher and on the left wing or side of the othere.There was 5 large white orange lighs on each craft.(no sound)
thay looked to be about 500 yards up.Not moveing vary fast at all.
thay went south in a strate line for about 3 min.Then it looked like the just stoped and huvered not going up or down.After a few mor min.They started off again but didnt bild up speed thay just went off.Then a %90
turn and off like i have never see before.
  i have see planes in combat and here doing munovers a lot but nuting like that.Helos and plaines just cant do what i saw .
  1 time before in late june i was looking at the moon and notest a star looking out of place all at onece it darted left tghen rite then up into the moon light were i lost it .
i told my son mike and he got excited and said he and his wife saw it the night before but thay didnt wont to tolk about it to otheres at the time.Thanking we wouldn't beleve them.   
im now bring out vidio camras when i got out to look and a still.

think you
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg)
content.summary: 2 came over my head when i was setting up to watch the stares

content.detailedDescription: Abruptly awoken by "falling" out of bed. immediately thuoght, you guys missed the bed. then saw a small flashing light by the window and decided to investigate. then i saw it,a large disk shaped object, with a flashing light on the bottom, and smaller lights on the outer edges. i really wanted to see it again and kept thinking come back. it was heading west along superior street. had the urge to call daughter and say it was coming her way.
content.summary: Disk-oval with one flashing light on bottom and small lights around the outside.

content.detailedDescription: Went out side to get a cigarette out of my truck
content.summary: Saw object when i got out of my truck in the northern sky

content.detailedDescription: I woke up went to the bathroom and as i do every morning i looked at the clock.I heard my dogs barking and when i opened the door to tell them to shut up i noticed all the dogs around my house were barking.Then i could feel more than hear a low hum.I looked around in the pasture next to my house was the same trangle that i have seen several times.This time there were short flashes of bright blueishwhite light .Its was moving north very slow,i watched it for about two min. it was cold and i had no shoes on so i came back in and chaled it up to a number of sightings of the same craft.It was about 400 feet off the ground and about 50 yrds away.The flashes went on 5 times and stoped.
content.summary: Triangle with optical camoflage

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on interstate 5 in orange county at about 75 miles an hour. my 13 year old daghter was in the car and pointed out the window saying "daddy, what is that thing?". i leaned forward and looked up. i saw something dark and circular with chasing lights and a red light on top. i told her it was a blimp. at the time it was moving very slowly. i thought the chasing lights were a message board on the side of a blimp. she asked me if i was sure so i looked again. it was definitely not a blimp. i could see a single line of chasing lights that would have a occassional break in them, kind of like a binary code or morse code. i could see they wrapped around the object. the red light on top stayed on continuously.
it continued slowly from the west to east side of the freeway. then back over the freeway. at this point we had been watching for about a minute. then the craft began accelerating very quickly heading north. when i say quickly, i mean like a jet taking off or faster, pulling away from us with some serious speed. i was positive at this point that it couldn't be a jet or a blimp. it seemed to be within 1,000 feet or so from the ground. we couldn't hear any noises.
we pulled over at avery parkway and continued to watch. our cameras on our cell phones weren't good enough to get a photo of it. it continued north at high speed for about 20 to 30 seconds after we pulled over. then it headed out over the ocean and was gone in the next 10 seconds. the whole event lasted between 2 and 3 minutes.
i've seen objects before, but this was definitely the closest and clearest i've ever been able to see one. it appeared to be a pretty simple looking craft compared to some of the descriptions i've heard in the past concerning ufo sightings.
it was the first time my daughter had seen anything like this. she was very excited.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Low flying, high speed, white lights chasing around, red light on top, flying north over i-5

content.detailedDescription: Was driving south on butterfield road between vernon hills and libertyville briefly saw a triangle flying low over the road from west to east. i noticed 3 steady white lights forming a triangle with a flashing light of the same color in the center. i only saw it briefly as reported above, though i believe i may have been able to make out a triangle shape between the lights and it seemed to turn slightly without banking. something felt funny in the way it was moving. i will be the first to admit i don't know much about aircraft lights apart from the red and green wing tip lights. it should be noted that cloud cover seemed to be very low so perhaps there are specific lights to be used in such conditions, during which may have blocked out the wing tip lights. i see planes flying in this area all the time, it was honestly the light color and movement that threw me off. as a ufo enthusiast i try to explain away almost everything i see flying as terrestrial, as i am naturally more prone to jump up and shout ufo!! this one just felt different. it absolutely could have been a plane i am a complete novice when it comes to aviation. i wanted to get this report in. i would disregard unless you hear a similar report in the same area.
content.summary: Low flying triangle

content.detailedDescription: My wife and 2 kids along with my brother and sister in-law climbed to the top of stone mountain mid day one nvember week-end of 2010.When they reached the top my brother decided to lay down to relax as he was looking upward to the sky with his shades on. he then saw what he thought was a transparent baloon approaching approximately around 3 feet in diameter slowly hovering towards him at about at a fairly close range/height.He described it as transparent where you can see through it, almost like a chameleon like effect like in predator the movie but still see the outline.Once it got above him it suddenly shot eastward at a high rate of speed as it turned into a dot in seconds until he could no longer see it. wife my has footgae of them being there as you can see my brother laying on his back then suddenly point to the sky but unfortunately my wife did not catch on to what my brother was getting excited about and never focused the camcorder upward to see what he was pointing to.There where other people around but since happened it was mid day everyone was looking to see the view of atlanta instead of looking into the sky plus the sun light beaming downward probably desguised the object from being seen.
content.summary: Transparent oval shaped baloon like thing

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside my house to the driveway and it was around 11- 12 at night when i heard this really loud hovering noise. i wasn't paying much attention then i walked a little and looked up and saw a really large ring in the sky, like a doughnut like if you turned a flashlight upside down and put a sticker in the middle. when i looked up the noise stopped and once i realized it was there it disappeared. after the experience i was very unnerved and experienced paranoia like someone was watching me, or something.
content.summary: I heard a loud noise and then i looked up and there was a ring in the sky then it dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from christmas shopping, my wife and i noticed ahead in the distance a light in which we assumed was a helicopter.  as we got closer to the object, we realized that it wasn't moving and was a much larger "manta ray" shaped craft as opposed to any helicopter we've ever seen. after passing the object we saw ahead another craft, similar shape and lighting pattern, also hovering.  we exited the next interstate exit and re-entered going back toward the objects to see if they were still there only to find both moving in a northerly direction.  we eventually lost sight of both objects as they gained altitude and speed.
content.summary: Two objects hovering approximately 200-300 feet above a major interstate.

content.detailedDescription:
I just got of of work, and was going to my mothers house. i stoped at the light at jefferson and woodward downtown detroit, i looked up just over the builings and saw 6 ufos together and one about 100 yards behind the six, they were only about 1 or 2 hundred feet above the builings. they
looked like they were maked out of aluminum.

the light changed, and i drove under cobo hall to jefferson and droved to the river, i got out of my car and watched them turn towards the ambassador bridge moving slowly, i watched them go over the the large part of the bridge on the canadian side.

there were no windows or doors and the sky was clear.
content.summary: Seven ufo's above detroit on a clear moring.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading westbound on grand river west of the airport on my motorcycle.  the sun was shining appox in the southwest.  i don't know why but this bright light caught my eye.  (there were high thin clouds but the object was below them)  i first thought that it was the headlight of an airplane landing but it seemed much brighter, almost like a welding torch,  being that the sun was bright and i had sunglasses on.  this light hovered, got even brighter then fizzled out leaving a silver/grey ball that then faded out in about 2 seconds. i was amazed that that silver/grey ball was left behind. i have no idea what that could have been. the time is within a minute or two as i was cutting it close with my daughter coming home from school
content.summary: Hovering ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the park infront of my house around midnight this night looking up at the sky and saw this object it seemed to be about the altitude of a satellite infact thats what i thought it was at first..It was slowly moving across then suddenly stopped after about staying a few minutes in an idol position..It shot off making a shape of a star almost and shot off into space...Im just reporting this which the incident happened in 1998 i didnt know where to report it until now..The incident is still so very clear in my mind.
content.summary: Thought was a satellite then it stopped and almost made a full star shape and shot straight off into space

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped outside at 12:45 am for a smoke before going to bed.  i am a professional pilot and somewhat of an amateur astronomer.  as is my habit, i scanned the sky for aircraft and identified jupiter, pleiades. taurus, orion, betelgeuse, sirius, etc.  it was then that i noticed a flash of an approximare magnitude of sirius about 15 degrees se of betelgeuse near procyon.

the object was staionary and remained so at an extreme altitude, well above the flight levels.  the light was white in color and flashed at intervals of 9 to 9.5 seconds with each flash about 1 to 2 seconds in duration.  the light was well defined in shape, being circular and unlike any aircraft anti-collision lights. 

after watching this object for 15 minutes i went inside to wake my wife and retreive my binoculars.  my wife is also a professional pilot and she witnessed the remainder of the observation.  

back outside, i trained my 9x binos on the object.  procyon was just visible inside the field-of-view and allowed me to determine that the object was not moving relative to that star.  i offered the binos to my wife and noticed that with the naked eye the object was not as bright as before.  after 5 more minutes it was not visible to the naked eye.  i continued to observe through the binos until 1:20 am when bands of cirrus began to obstuct the view completely.  total duration of the observation was :35 minutes.  

my wife and i have many decades and many, many thousands of hours aloft in everything from biplanes to big boeings.  we are certain this was no aircraft.  perhaps it was a slowly rotating satellite with the sun glinting off a mirrored  surface.  it was strange and we wish we had a better idea of what it was.
content.summary: High altitude, stationary, flashing object.

content.detailedDescription: Was getting ready to leave for work. i walked out to my car, looked up in the sky and i see a star-like object moving kind of slow toward the west. i called my dad who was inside to get him to come out and look at it. by the time he got outside, the object looked like it was going out of the atmosphere and it was gone. the object was glowing white and i could see just a little bit of red in it. i thought the object could be a satellite moving, but it clearly was not one because it was to far into the atmospere. there was also 2 planes that i could see in my vision. the lights on these planes were blinking like strobes. i was excited that i got to see my first ufo that i know of.
content.summary: Saw a star like object moving in the sky, lasted for about 2 minutes then it disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of 11-8-2010 i was coming home from town. as i pulled in the driveway i noticed 3 bright lights in a diagonal line over the trees across the field. i stopped and looked but kept driving. as i went further down the driveway i was trying to figure out what i had seen. i backed the car up and parked in the field and watched. when i got back down the driveway the top  light had now moved down and the lights were now in a triangular formation. they were very bright and appeared to be very close and low, just over the trees it seemed. they hoovered in the same spot for about 15 minutes and then one just faded out.Then a few minutes later the second faded away. then the third. the next night 11-9-2010, i was coming home around the same time, but this time i had my nephew with me. we saw what appeared to be the same lights hoovering in the same location and as before they hung around for at least 15 minutes. we drove over to the next driveway on the other side of the field to see if we could tell what the object(s) were but all we could see were the lights. as before, one by one they just faded away. i've been out to the field several nights and just sat and watched, but there has been nothing out there since those two nights. from what i am reading, there are reports of sightings in several surrounding counties in the last two weeks. conyers, covington, monroe, madison and some further out.. two sightings in clayton county and i believe one more but i don't recall the county. also, there was a report of a sonic boom as reported in the ajc that was heard around carrol, douglas and harelson counties. very strange.

in the pictures i've attached, there is a bright light at the bottom of the photo and a smaller light to the right. the light to the right is our neighbors street light and the light to the left is a reflection off of a license plate. the lights at the top of the photo are those that appeared to be hoovering in the sky.
content.summary: Unknown lights hovering in the sky - walnut grove, ga

content.detailedDescription: I recieved a call from my friend around 7 pm when she was driving on k10 coming from olathe to lawrence. she said she saw something that looked like a ufo because it was low and seemed to be hovering and there were blinking lights on it. we blew it off until me and another one of my friends were driving from lawrence toward olathe at around 9 pm and we saw the exact thing that my first friend had described. the ufo started off looking like a star. it then got extremely bright and started lowering, moving toward us driving on the highway. it flew directly over us and the bottom of it looked to be in a triangle shape with the same lights described above. we then saw another ufo act in the same exact way. we went back into town then grabbed a few of our friends because we saw so many abnormally twinkling "stars" that turned out to look like triangle ships as the dropped down. we went back on k10 and pulled off in a dim area to watch this strange situation. sure enough, the same exact thing happened with three more ships, all looking similar but the blinking of the lights seemed to be different for each ship. there were two ufos that were next to each other then one started moving up and one started moving down at the same time. there were so many bright ufos in the sky that stayed in the same place for the most part but would tend to minutely move up, down and side to side. the last ship we saw that came down made a sound when we didn't hear a sound come from any of the other ones we saw. it sounded like a "whomping" noise (hard to explain). two of my friends said that they felt tingly all over and the top of their head was tingling sensationably and they couldn't help but have tears come even though they were not sad, they could not explain why this was happening to them. eventually we came back home because it was getting late, but they never left the sky.
content.summary: They all looked like triangles, some more like pyramids. they had red, blue and white lights flashing on them.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my hotel room at the holiday inn (1805 hotel plaza blvd, lake buena vista, fl 32830), when my 9 year old grandaughter said it was thundering outside. i went out on the balcony to look.  at first, i thought the noise was an airplane because i could see one traveling across the sky and then i realized it was a firework show over disney world (probably magic kingdom but i'm not familiar with the area enough to be sure and we are several miles away and couldn't actually see the fireworks).  

after i figured out what the noise was, i noticed a star-like light very high in the sky, well above the airplane that was flying in the sky.  it really stood out because there was not a single other star in the sky.  i thought it odd because i'd been at the firework show at magic kingdom the night before and had seen a lot of stars in the sky so this difference really caught my attention and caused me to really focus on the star-like object.  

after a few minutes, i saw the object move very slightly, so slightly i felt maybe it had not happened.  i also was a bit freaked because i had seen a similar looking object back in oregon last week when i was walking my dog late at night.  it also moved very slightly and i felt perhaps i was imagining it so i thought oh no, my mind is playing tricks again.  but, this also caused me to really fixate and watch the object and when i saw it slightly glide just a tiny bit a couple more times, i called out my grandaughter to see if her younger eyes noticed anything.  asked her to watch it and she humored me and then got a little scared when she and i both saw it move a bit slightly.  we came back into the room and i talked to her- she wanted to know if there were humans or aliens in the ufo and i reassured her that everything was ok.  

i went back into the room for awhile to keep her company and kept peeking to see if it stayed, which it did.  about 10 or 15 minutes after the fireworks stopped, i saw the light move more noticeably and then it started to dim and then got bright again and did this about 2 times before i called my grandaughter back out to look.  she and i watched as it dimmed and lit back up and then it totally disappeared and then quickly lit back up and dimmed and lit back up one more time.  then it disappeared and slightly after this we heard a sound like a backfire or firework and we could not see it anymore.  

we went back inside and i kept checking periodically and about 10 minutes of it not being there, the next time i went out it was back in the same location in the sky.  it stayed for awhile and i just went out to check and it is still there and it's now 22:16.  in fact, it's movements are not as subtle and i could see it moving from side to side in a downward semi-circle pattern several times.  it moves slightly and then steadies and remains still for awhile and repeats this way over and over.  unfortunately, i don't have any binoculars handy but am wishing i did so i could see even better.  i just went out one more time before i submit this.  at approximately 22:31, i saw it dim again and then a large cloud cover moved in between the oject and i and i couldn't see it anymore.  i waited for about 5 mins but the clouds continued to block the view and i can't tell if it's still there or not.  

as far as my feelings about the sighting- i felt a mixture of excitment and skepticism when i first saw it.  the excitement remained as i watched and then i was a little frightened when we saw it dim and re-light and disappear.  right now, i feel calm with an underlying excitement.  i have had a couple of experiences in the past 2 years where i spotted a ufo-like object but have been by myself and just tried to put it out of my mind because i felt maybe i was imagining or perhaps even delusional.     

this event made me feel compelled enough to search the internet and find this site to make the report.  i also will be researching the internet to learn more about other sightings at disney world- i really got the sense that the object was there to watch the firework show.  

i just looked outside again, it's 22:41 now, the clouds are all gone (not a single one in sight) and the star-like object is absolutely not present.
content.summary: Ufo over disney world during and after firework show
